name: Finvi RPA Case Study - Collection Process Automation with AI/ML Integration
description: Implemented comprehensive RPA solution for collection process automation integrated with AI/ML capabilities, transforming manual collection workflows into intelligent automated processes that significantly improved operational efficiency and revenue recovery.
challenge: Finvi's collection processes were heavily manual and time-intensive, requiring significant human intervention for routine tasks such as account processing, payment tracking, communication workflows, and data entry. The manual processes led to inconsistent execution, delayed responses to customer inquiries, increased operational costs, and limited scalability. The challenge was compounded by the need to integrate advanced AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics while maintaining compliance with financial services regulations.
solution: Deployed end-to-end RPA automation for collection processes using UiPath platform with integrated AI/ML components. The solution automated account processing workflows, payment tracking and reconciliation, customer communication sequences, data entry and validation processes, and compliance reporting. Advanced AI/ML integration enabled predictive propensity-to-pay modeling, intelligent routing of collection cases, automated decision-making for payment arrangements, and real-time analytics for collection strategy optimization.
outcomes: 75% reduction in manual processing time for collection workflows
90% improvement in data accuracy through automated validation
50% faster response time to customer payment inquiries
35% increase in collection recovery rates through AI-optimized strategies
60% reduction in operational costs for collection processes
Enhanced compliance monitoring with automated audit trails
Improved customer experience through consistent and timely communications
Scalable infrastructure supporting 3x increase in collection volume capacity
teamSize: 12-person RPA development and AI integration team
